about_the_game:
Cosmic Race: Galactic Showdown is an arcade racing game that involves vehicular combat in extra-terrestrial locations. Players defeat their opponents in the biggest racing tournament of the galaxy to be the Galactic Champion! The game celebrates the fun of retro racing games through stylized visuals and synthwave music.

Get hooked into the vehicle’s responsive controls and robust physics in a refreshing gameplay experience. The combat system adds another layer of dynamics to the game. Cast special abilities to disrupt enemies, or help team-mates. Unique abilities ranging from projectiles and deployable to global AOE power-ups.

You can drive from a collection of 25 unique sci-fi vehicles inspired by the most iconic cars from the era of the 80s and 90s. They are categorized into 4 classes:

  • LMVs - Exceptional agility, can navigate tight spaces and dodge obstacles.

  • Super Cars - Unmatched top speeds for long stretches, with decent handling.

  • SUVs - Designed to handle rough terrains and can break through hard obstacles.

  • Tanks - Enormous monster trucks that can crush obstacles, LMVs, and Supercars.

Play as a racer from Earth, leading his team on a journey to become the Cosmic Champion. Your team needs to win races to proceed to higher-ranked events. In the Single Player Campaign, you compete against bot racers that get deadlier as you proceed through events.

Games Modes and Player Interactions are innovatively designed for team-based and non-team-based activities. Create LAN / Online lobbies, and let your friends and other players join for unlimited fun.

  • Classic Race: Traditional racing where racers complete several laps of a predetermined course. The first to cross the finish line after completing the designated laps gets the most amount of points.

  • Time Trials: Race against the clock to set the fastest lap time on the track. Utilize driving skills, track knowledge, and special abilities to achieve the best time individually and as a team.

  • Bomb Rush: Deliver bombs to safe zones while managing the countdown timer and avoiding explosions. The team with the most successful deliveries wins.

  • Domination: Capture and hold control zones while racing to earn points. Coordinate with your team to defend captured zones and disrupt the enemy team's efforts.

  • Destruction Rally: Complete as many laps as possible while causing maximum destruction to opponents. In a given time, the team with the most destruction points and completed laps wins.

  • Capture The Flag: Capture and deposit as many flags as possible as a collective team effort. Once the timer runs out, the team with the most amount of flags deposits wins.

  • Infection: one Car gets infected at the start. The racer has to Tag/touch the other car to pass the infection. Now, both cars chase other racers to infect them until all cars are infected. The last car to get infected gets the most points.

name: Cosmic Race: Galactic Showdown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 with 2.8 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce® GTX™ 560 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: This config will run the game with approx 30 FPS on 1080p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 with 3.0 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX™ 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: This config will run the game with approx 60 FPS on 1080p

short_description: Cosmic Race is a sci-fi Combat Racing game inspired by retro arcade racers. Race across vibrant alien worlds, defeat opponents in destruction-rich environments, and become the Cosmic Champion.
